data.text: Semantics plays a crucial role in my approach to building software. In every project I undertake, I prioritize semantic correctness to ensure that the codebase is not only functional but also easy to understand and maintain. By adhering to semantic principles, I aim to make the code more meaningful and intuitive, promoting clarity for both myself and any collaborators who may work with the code in the future.
These examples are from The Mcbride Company's website, which I built from the ground up. The site is built with semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is fully responsive.
